title: J. B. Bickerstaff - Wikipedia
snippet: On July 3, 2024, Bickerstaff became the new head coach of the Detroit Pistons. On December 23, Bickerstaff would lead the Pistons to their 15th win of the season. This would be one more win than the Pistons had for the entirety of the 2023-24 season. On March 28, 2025, Bickerstaff would help lead the Pistons to their first playoff appearance since the 2018–19 season.

title: DETROIT PISTONS ANNOUNCE J.B. BICKERSTAFF AS HEAD COACH
snippet: The Detroit Pistons announced today an agreement with J.B. Bickerstaff to join the organization as head coach.

title: J.B. Bickerstaff & Pistons Staff Win 2024-25 COTM for February | The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association
snippet: Eastern Conference Coach of the Month, J.B. Bickerstaff, led the Detroit Pistons to a 9-3 record in February 2025. This marks the 2nd time in Coach Bickerstaff’s coaching career that he has won NBA Coach of the Month.

title: DETROIT PISTONS ANNOUNCE COACHING STAFF | Detroit Pistons
snippet: The Detroit Pistons announced today that Luke Walton, Sidney Lowe, Fred Vinson, Vitaly Potapenko, Kevin Burleson, Jerome Allen and Josh Estes have been named...

title: Detroit Pistons coach rips referees after loss to Dallas Mavericks
snippet: Coach J.B. Bickerstaff made the Detroit Pistons' frustrations known during his press conference after their 116-114 loss in overtime on Thursday.
